citations.narrative:
The storage area of two bags of unopened dog food had some spilled feed and rodent droppings between the bags of
food. Rodent droppings suggest vermin such as mice can get into the food supply and rodents can contaminate food and
make dogs sick. Ensure that food is stored in a manner that protects food and bedding supplies from vermin infestation.
***Correct by 3/18/2025 (facility cleaned out spilled feed and droppings prior to exit interview, ensure food storage area is
protected from rodent entry).
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
The storage area of two bags of unopened dog food had some spilled feed and rodent droppings between the bags of 
food. Rodent droppings suggest vermin such as mice can get into the food supply and rodents can contaminate food and 
make dogs sick. Ensure that food is stored in a manner that protects food and bedding supplies from vermin infestation.  
***Correct by 3/18/2025 (facility cleaned out spilled feed and droppings prior to exit interview, ensure food storage area is 
protected from rodent entry). 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
